TextBody:
Hi Christeen,

Thank you for your email.
This is for now a known issue- the hotfix will linger on, even after it was applied and it won't go away.
This should be addressed with our next server version release, so 5.9.4.0 which should not be too far away, time wise.


Adrian Stanca
Technical Support Engineer

DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | Enforced Encryption | eDiscovery
